param.name: gatk_param_type_selector
param.label: Basic or Advanced GATK options

param.name: pedigree_file
param.label: Pedigree files for samples

param.name: pedigree_string
param.label: Pedigree string for samples

param.name: pedigree_validation_type
param.label: How strict should we be in validating the pedigree information

param.name: read_filter_type_selector
param.label: Read Filter Type

param.name: min_mapping_quality_score
param.label: Minimum read mapping quality required to consider a read for calling

param.name: maxInsertSize
param.label: Discard reads with insert size greater than the specified value

param.name: maxReadLength
param.label: Max Read Length

param.name: PLFilterName
param.label: Discard reads with RG:PL attribute containing this string

param.name: readName
param.label: Filter out all reads except those with this read name

param.name: filterPositive
param.label: Discard reads on the forward strand

param.name: default_mapping_quality
param.label: Default read mapping quality to assign to all reads

param.name: sample_to_keep
param.label: The name of the sample(s) to keep, filtering out all others

param.name: read_group_to_keep
param.label: The name of the read group to keep, filtering out all others

param.name: input_intervals
param.label: Genomic intervals

param.name: input_exclude_intervals
param.label: Genomic intervals

param.name: interval_set_rule
param.label: Interval set rule

param.name: downsampling_type_selector
param.label: Type of reads downsampling to employ at a given locus

param.name: downsample_to_type_selector
param.label: Downsample method

param.name: downsample_to_value
param.label: Fraction [0.0-1.0] of reads to downsample to

param.name: downsample_to_value
param.label: Coverage to downsample to at any given locus

param.name: downsample_to_type_selector
param.label: Downsample method

param.name: downsample_to_value
param.label: Fraction [0.0-1.0] of reads to downsample to

param.name: downsample_to_value
param.label: Coverage to downsample to at any given locus

param.name: baq
param.label: Type of BAQ calculation to apply in the engine

param.name: baq_gap_open_penalty
param.label: BAQ gap open penalty (Phred Scaled)
param.help: Default value is 40. 30 is perhaps better for whole genome call sets. -baqGOP,--baqGapOpenPenalty <baqGapOpenPenalty>

param.name: use_original_qualities
param.label: Use the original base quality scores from the OQ tag

param.name: default_base_qualities
param.label: Value to be used for all base quality scores, when some are missing

param.name: validation_strictness
param.label: How strict should we be with validation

param.name: interval_merging
param.label: Interval merging rule

param.name: read_group_black_list_type_selector
param.label: Type of reads read group black list

param.name: read_group_black_list
param.label: Read group black list file

param.name: read_group_black_list
param.label: Read group black list tag:string

param.name: disable_experimental_low_memory_sharding
param.label: Disable experimental low-memory sharding functionality.

param.name: non_deterministic_random_seed
param.label: Makes the GATK behave non deterministically, that is, the random numbers generated will be different in every run

param.name: analysis_param_type_selector
param.label: Basic or Advanced Analysis options

param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the reference list
